Package org.ptolemy.optimization

Class BarrierMethod

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ptolemy.optimization.BarrierMethod
  • public class BarrierMethod
extends java.lang.Object
    BarrierMethod. Convex Optimization P.583, 11.3.The Barrier method This class solves min(BarrierFunction B = f0(x)-(1/t)sum(log(-fi(x)))) using Newton decrement.
    Since:
    Ptolemy II 11.0
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Shuhei Emoto
    Pt.AcceptedRating:
    Pt.ProposedRating:
    Red (shuhei)
